name: liri-node-app
description: Liri.js NodeJS App This application calls the spotify API using the spotify-this-song command and shows the name of the song a user types, artist, and spotify ID link. This application calls the OMDB to using the movie-this command to show the movie's information. This application calls the bandsintown API using the concert-this command to show the name venue and date.  The date is formated using moment.js
